review.comment: Sorry this review is so late. Had a home theater set up last summer using both existing and new equipment. It sounds and looks amazing! Everyone was a pleasure to work with.
Robert and the team were professional since our first phone call. They come highly recommended after an efficient 3 TV hang and cable management job, I can not recommend them enough.

My husband and I used SCV Audio Video and had a wonderful experience! Robert and his team were thorough, listened to what we wanted, and got the job done on a timely matter. We will definitely be using them again in the future, and we highly recommend them!

Thank you SCV Audio Video! Robert and his team installed speakers at my office and did an amazing job! They were professional, efficient and incredibly helpful in explaining my options. I highly recommend them!

Robert is a remarkable individual and it shows in his quality of care he puts into his work. From watching his videos to hearing him speak about the industry, the passion he has is golden. You cannot go wrong when choosing SCV Audio Video for your home installation.

SCV Audio Video has been our "go to" for any and all TV/ Stereo installation. Robert & his team are fast, polite, & most importantly, very knowledgeable! I love the job they did in our family room ( no cords/ no mess) / the work they did was very professional. Did not hesitate to have them back out  to mount our outdoor equipment the minute our backyard renovation was done! I would highly recommend SCV Audio Video to anyone looking to have quality work done!

I wanted to surprise my husband with a new surround sound through the house and connect it with speakers in the backyard. Robert and his guys were here with in 48 hours and went above and beyond. They hid all the wiring, cable box, streaming box everything and calibrated the system to have the most amazing quality sound! Also they organized everything and all the wires so that the cabinet holding everything even looks amazingly clean!! He really is passionate about what he does and so are his guys. They truly are the best in the business and would recommend them to everyone!!

I've known Robert for over 10 years. His work has always been extraordinary. His attention to detail is unmatched and he will go above and beyond for his clients.  Give him a shot. You won't regret it!
I highly recommend SCV audio video!  They’ve done several jobs for me and super pleased .
Awesome crew, great work on my business lighting and tv. Months after install when I had a problem, Robert was there to fix it the same day!

I have a electrical company and have been referring Robert and his crew for years! I have never had one complaint about his work from the many people I have sent him too and they keep everything very clean while working

These people are the top of the top for both quality of work and customer service. They've mounted my TVs multiple times, always arrived on time and even come as VolunTEERS before Thanksgiving to help make meals for homeless people. More businesses need to do business the way Robert and his team does!

SCV Audio Video is AWESOME. They have installed surround sound and a wifi booster in my home. I love how fast and efficient they were and they cleaned up their mess like it was their own home. They did such a great job that I referred them to my mom, and they installed surround sound and mounted a TV above a fireplace on super thick rock! They exceeded any expectations. I promise you will be happy with your audio video needs when you hire SCV Audio Video!
My go to for all av installations! They are very profession, clean, thorough and fast! Just had my new 75" Samsung installed! I highly recommend them!!

If you’d like TOP OF THE LINE audio visual work... stop searching and hire Robert and his team.  He’s the best in town and maintains excellent standards. He doesn’t cut corners and develops long standing relationships with his clients ensuring their equipment is working for years to come.

SCV audio visual is the best in town hands down.  I made the mistake of hiring someone else and spent months trying to get them to finish the project. Robert and his team identified the problem and had my entire system up within MINUTES.

They are the best.  Stop searching and hire them.
Robert Marshall is a great stand up business man. He runs Exclusive Installation and I highly recommend them. I run a construction business and refer him to my customers.
Robert at SCV Audio Video is always reliable and has done quality work for me on many jobs for a great price. Can’t recommend him higher.
The work that SCV Audio Video does is incredible!  Looking forward to having them do some work on our new home soon.

SCV Audio Video is the ONLY company I will let touch my system. I have had multiple Man Caves that require a very special and custom touch. When I first met Robert and he explained his approach I knew right away that there was no choice as to who does the work. SCV Audio Video has the best touch, best equipment and the VERY best solutions. Thanks Robert and team for always installing with such perfection for the last 10 years!

Robert is great. He was on time, had everything needed to complete the installation of my television, and left the work area clean when He finished. If you're conscious over who does work on your home, you can trust Robert.

We worked with Robert and SCV Audio Video in July, 2016.  What a great experience.  Rob and his team installed an audio visual system in our family room.  They did everything they said they would do, when they said they would do it, for the price they said they would do it and were extremely pleasant to work with.  Since installation, it has worked perfectly.  We are really enjoying it as we enjoyed working with Rob and his team.  We highly recommend them.

These guys know what they are doing, in a major way. Robert is very professional, knowledgable, friendly and kind. They had all four of our tv's floating from the wall in no time. The best part is that you don't need to go behind them and clean or touch up any paint once they're done!! I think Robert was a wizard in his former life.

Robert is top notch. He is honest with his quote, and ensures the job is done correctly. He makes sure all questions are answered before he leaves. The first project for us was to install a flat screen tv and surround sound speaker system. He even got it set up to be run on our iPhones and iPad. We had him back a second time to install our outdoor tv and sound bar. Beyond his work ethic, he is a really nice guy as well. We look forward to including him on future projects. I recommend him to all of my friends and family!

SCV Audio Video did an amazing job putting together my surround sound and home theater. Thanks Guys. Quote was accurate and worth every penny.  Robert & his team were professional and just really nice people.  I would recommend them to family and hire them again.
